page.title: 10AMERICAN SCHOOLS (cont).
page.content:
The schools are regularly inspected by a representative of a European school council to keep a check on the schools standard which is now very high.The pupils have their own student council which contributes in a large way to the running of the school. The pupils and teachers alike are very friendly and enjoy being at the American school (although they would prefer to be back in America).This is brought out by the decor and the attitude shown by both sets of people.
by Angela Deans and Mhairi Harvey
